attributes.action: Build closed off cycle lanes on all major roads!
attributes.background:
To many cycling  lives  are being lost on roads. We need to build more closed off cycling lanes to protect cyclist from being hit by moving vehicles and careless drivers. I would be happy to pay a tax of some sort to use these safe cycle lanes. 1 life lost is 1 to many in my opinion!
Please sign up

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not responsible for local roads. If your petition is about cycle lanes on local roads, then you could start a petition calling for local councils to be required to create cycle paths on roads in their area.

The Government is responsible for motorways and major A roads. If you would like cycle lanes to be provided on these roads, then you could start a petition about that.
